amendatorysection.bookinfo: Uniform Commercial Code, Revised Statutes Supplement, 2021
amendatorysection.para: (a) In this article, "controllable electronic record" means an electronic record that can be subjected to control (section 12-105). The term does not include electronic chattel paper, electronic documents, investment property, and transferable records under the Uniform Electronic Transactions Act.
(b) The definitions of "account," "account debtor," "authenticate," "electronic chattel paper," "investment property," and "payment intangible" in article 9 apply to this article.

crossreference.para: Uniform Electronic Transactions Act, see section 86-612.
